tweet.text: During his time as Secretary of State, Shultz confronted the humanitarian crisis of widespread famine in Africa. This #FRUS chapter on “African Famine” documents Administration response from 1983 to 1988: https://t.co/4o4pufJfr0 https://t.co/uSfIGaB6oP
